column44: %s Each submunition hit on hull deals an additional %s damage over %s seconds. This damage is reduced by armour.

Hits on hull or armor frequently arc to weapons and engines, dealing extra EMP and energy damage. Hits on shields have a chance to generate a shield-penetrating arc based on the target's hard flux level.
